citation: Proclamation under the Residential Building Work Contracts and Dispute Resolution Act 2016 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Residential Building Work Contracts and Dispute Resolution Act 2016

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Residential Building Work Contracts and Dispute Resolution Act 2016 fix 1 January 2017 as the day on which that Act commences.

13 December 2016

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 December 2016

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
